Reviews.Content: Nice hotel with Canal views We stayed in the hotel for 2 days in early April. The rooms are small but nicely decorated. Very friendly staff and the lounge area downstairs has free drinks and nibblies and free access to the Internet.
Reviews.Author: RobertKaren

Reviews.Content: Un hotel con estilo a buen precio   showReview(18308469, 'full');
